channel.title: Server Ip issues
channel.description:
I went through No-Ip.com and stuff made my hostname thing
I tried making Hellzend69.no-ip.biz.. I made it..
I can only log on as localhost when i get it to run
How can I make it so I can log on server IP as Hellzend69.no-ip.biz and let everyone else get on it too?
I want to make it so everyone else can play on it too.
Please help
-Silly Faggit

item.title: Server Ip issues
item.dc:creator: @Rudolph Rudolph
item.description:
@Rudolph wrote:

[quote=“Budda, post:2, topic:106490”]YOU can’t log in through your no-ip. Once the No-Ip DUC is running and updated, theneveryone else should be able to log in through it, however, you still must use localhost.[/quote]Yes you can log in through no-ip. I don’t have to use your localhost.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Ip issues
item.dc:creator: @silly_faggit silly_faggit
item.description:
@silly_faggit wrote:

It said it was sucessful when i made the No-Ip hostname and when I get on Localhost nobody else can get on with my No-Ip thing anyhow.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Ip issues
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

YOU can’t log in through your no-ip. Once the No-Ip DUC is running and updated, theneveryone else should be able to log in through it, however, you still must use localhost.

Read full topic
